shows.title: Strange Physics & Giza Plateau / Bigfoot Phenomena
shows.first_half: First Half: Engineer Christopher Dunn delves into the work of Dr. Friedemann Freund and his findings about the underlying physics behind earthquake lights. Dunn will also discuss recent discoveries of structures under the Giza Plateau and how they could provide insight into harnessing vast amounts of energy from the earth.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher William Sheehan reports on Bigfoot phenomena, including a variety of sightings and encounters. He'll probe natural and supernatural explanations, and look at older, historical data regarding Bigfoot's existence, including tribal history and a possible UFO connection.

shows.title: The Other Side / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Paranormal investigator Chip Coffey will discuss the Other Side, what happens when we get there, and what we can do on Earth to help us on our journey. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George Noory a call and share experiences, weird tales, or whatever is on your mind!
